title: GraphQL context setup
description: Implement `app/graphql/context.py` with Context dataclass containing session (AsyncSession) and current_user_id (str | None = None). Implement async context_getter function that extracts AsyncSession from request state and returns Context instance. This will be used with GraphQLRouter.
acceptance_criteria:
- Context dataclass with session and current_user_id fields
- context_getter async function implemented
- Function integrates with FastAPI request/dependency injection
- Returns Context with session from get_session()
